payload.query: Design and deploy centralized knowledge base for agent shared memory. Use vector database (ChromaDB, Pinecone, or Weaviate) for semantic search capabilities. Store: task history, decisions made, learnings, best practices, failure patterns, solution patterns. Implement knowledge contribution API for agents to write learnings. Build knowledge query API for agents to retrieve relevant information. Add knowledge versioning and audit trail. Create knowledge relevance scoring system. Implement knowledge retention policies (what to keep, what to archive).
payload.title: PHASE 2.2: Implement Shared Knowledge Base
